column1: | wirene rich 90 of largo passed away june 10
column3: mrs. rich came here from kiamesha lake new york. she was a retired executive law secretary. survivors include her son richard
column4: and loving family. services will be tuesday
column6: followed by burial at cedar park cemetery in paramus
column7: new jersey. david c. gross funeral homes
column8: belcher road chapel in clearwater is serving the family. online condolences there are currently no condolence messages to view. david c. gross funeral home and cremation center. phone: 727-381-4911 click to visit the david c. gross funeral home and cremation center website irene rich 8/16/1924 - 06/10/2015 {1} ##loc[ok]## {1} ##loc[ok]## ##loc[cancel]## {1} ##loc[ok]## ##loc[cancel]## add. this sharing. compacthide. showadd. this
